title: DAMAGED HAIR? Discover A New Way to Repair It | Garnier Fructis
description: Say goodbye to damage and learn how to get repaired, super hair. Paraben-free and infused with super fruit Amla Oil, all-new Garnier Fructis Damage Eraser leaves strands 2x stronger with every wash.

asset.author: GarnierUSA
asset.description:
Say goodbye to damage and learn how to get repaired, super hair. Paraben-free and infused with super fruit Amla Oil, all-new Garnier Fructis Damage Eraser leaves strands 2x stronger with every wash.         

Learn more about Damage Eraser: http://www.garnierusa.com/products/haircare/damage-eraser.aspx

transcripts: Repair damaged hair in just one use all new fructis damage eraser superfruit amla oil, no parabens, hair is two times stronger. Dmaged erased, all new garnier fructis superfruit super hair. Garnier.
